metadata.synopsis: Isobel is being attacked. Jaheira calls people to defend Isobel, as their lives depend on her.This dialog can happen anywhere in Last Light, but mainly close to Isobel's room.
metadata.how_to_trigger: if the player attacks Isobel and Jaheira enters the same combat, Jaheira does this dialog on her turn. Only in HAV.

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: To arms! Protect Isobel at all cost!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Focus should be on the shoulders up to obscure whether or not Jaheira has a weapon in hand (cannot be guaranteed).NodeContext: Shouted during the onset of battle

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Focus should be on the shoulders up to obscure whether or not Jaheira has a weapon in hand (cannot be guaranteed).NodeContext: Shouted during the onset of battle
